start.description: You find yourself at the entrance of Shmoopland, a magical realm full of wonder and mystery. The air sparkles with possibility, and a cheerful sign welcomes visitors.

town_square.description: You're in the bustling town square of Shmoopland. Colorful buildings surround you, and the sound of cheerful music fills the air. A magical fountain sprays rainbow-colored water in the center.

market.description: The Shmoopland Market is a lively place filled with floating stalls and magical merchandise. Glowing crystals provide soft illumination, and the air smells of sweet treats.

park.description: The Whispering Park is a peaceful garden where flowers sing soft melodies. Butterflies with tiny lanterns flutter about, creating a magical light show.

wizard_tower.description: The base of a tall, spiraling tower that seems to defy gravity. Magical runes pulse with energy along its walls, and a mysterious door beckons.

tower_top.description: The top of the wizard's tower offers a breathtaking view of all Shmoopland. A mysterious workbench covered in magical items sits in the center of the room.

welcome_sign.description: A cheerful sign welcoming visitors to Shmoopland
welcome_sign.examine_text: The sign reads: 'Welcome to Shmoopland! Where magic and whimsy come together. Please enjoy your stay and remember: everything is possible with a sprinkle of imagination!'

magic_coin.description: A shimmering coin that seems to float slightly above surfaces
magic_coin.examine_text: This golden coin is warm to the touch and occasionally emits tiny sparkles. It hovers just above your palm when you hold it.

singing_flower.description: A beautiful flower that hums a gentle melody
singing_flower.examine_text: As you look closer, the flower begins to sing a sweet lullaby. Its petals glow softly in rhythm with the song.

crystal_prism.description: A multi-faceted crystal that splits light into rainbow colors
crystal_prism.examine_text: When you hold it up to the light, it creates a dazzling display of colors that dance around you. It feels cool and smooth to the touch.

wizard_hat.description: A pointed hat decorated with stars and moons
wizard_hat.examine_text: This magnificent hat is adorned with constellations that actually twinkle. It feels warm with magical energy.
